EmailTemplate.name: Facilitator Agreement Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: Please complete our Team Facilitator Agreement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.FirstName__c} {!Account.LastName__c},
We are happy to let you know that your background check is complete and you have met all requirements for our courses and workshop become an Atlas Team Facilitator. . Thank you for your efforts. We are excited to move to the next steps.
First, please complete this agreement. It is for one year and we will ask you to revisit it each year.
*Team Facilitator Agreement: https://www.tfaforms.com/4823762
Once we have received it, we will followup with details on getting going on your practicum and working with clients.
As always, let us know any questions. We can't wait to have you working with our clients!
Best, Molly and Atlas Assistance Dogs
